channel.title: Ava DuVernay on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ava DuVernay on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Paramount Condemns Israeli Film Boycott Amid Palestine Conflict: “We Do Not Agree”
item.description: “We need more engagement and communication — not less,” the studio said in a statement released Friday in the wake of a pledge signed by stars like Emma Stone, Mark Ruffalo and Ayo Edebiri.
